verbose_text: Common bean dry biomass was significantly increased by application of N, P and NP in both degraded and non degraded soils, but biomass was a maximum of only 0.17 Mg ha -1 under degraded soils compared 1.2 Mg ha -1 for non degraded soils (XREF_FIG).
evidence: bean dry biomass was significantly increased by application of N, P and NP
